projects.title: Pulse
projects.description: Real time crowd info for your next move

images.caption: Pulse is a real-time crowd and vibe checker to help beat decision paralysis and empower people to move through their city with confidence.
Leverages real-time user data to provide information about crowd density and user sentiment for any location.
Users contribute to the data pool via short in-app feedback surveys.
Data is then used to provide machine backed recommendations for personalized points of interest for their next move.

projects.title: Gilbert
projects.description: A collaborative platform AI assistant to help teams get to synergy sooner.

images.caption: Gilbert is a collaborative platform AI assistant designed to help teams achieve synergy more quickly.
Utilizes advanced AI algorithms to analyze team dynamics and provide actionable insights.
Users contribute to the data pool via short in-app feedback surveys.
Data is then used to provide machine backed recommendations for personalized points of interest for their next move.
